column4: ok, i need to use recordmydesktop for a project.  I need to reroute sound from my mp3 app and record it along with the desktop( its a presentation thing.)  But, im really having a hard time understanding how this works.
you wont want to have recordmydesktop record the sound, you will want to add it to the video later
cool and umm how would i go about that?
any video editor, im not an expert but i know you will want to add it later, it will have better sound quality
